techmeme.title: Google says it has partnered with the AP to deliver a feed of real-time information to enhance the usefulness of results displayed in the Gemini app (Jaffer Zaidi/The Keyword)
The FTC sues John Deere, alleging it illegally drove up repair costs by making its software repair tool available only to its authorized dealers (Reuters)
Nikita Bier, creator of apps like tbh and anonymous compliments app Gas, launches Explode, a freemium app to send disappearing texts and photos via iMessage (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Maki, which provides companies a conversational AI agent for job interviews and candidate filtering, raised a $28.6M Series A led by Blossom Capital (Mike Butcher/TechCrunch)
The US unveils new rules to curb flow of advanced chips produced by TSMC and others to China and sanctions 16 Chinese companies building China's chip industry (Mackenzie Hawkins/Bloomberg)
